languages.text: "Вы готовы выступить лично? Весомый аргумент, с вами у сопротивления есть шанс... Умеете вы переменить ситуацию, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: "Аргумент. С вашими ресурсами и могуществом у сопротивления действительно есть шанс. Да, пожалуй, это и правда меняет дело. Сама я боец не ахти, но кое-чем подсобить все же могу..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "You're personally willing to stand against her? That changes things significantly. With you, the resistance has a chance... You certainly know how to turn a situation around, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
languages.original_text: "Вы готовы выступить лично? Весомый аргумент, с вами у сопротивления есть шанс... Умеете вы переменить ситуацию, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: "Are you willing to take a stand against her in person? That would be a powerful argument. With you, the resistance has a chance... You sure know how to turn a situation around, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Are you willing to take a stand against her in person? That would be a powerful argument. With you, the resistance has a chance... You sure know how to turn a situation around, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: "You're personally willing to stand against her? That changes things significantly. With you, the resistance has a chance... You certainly know how to turn a situation around, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: "You're personally willing to stand against her? That changes things significantly. With you, the resistance has a chance... You certainly know how to turn a situation around, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: “你打算亲自站出来反对她吗？那情况可就不一样了。如果有你在，反抗军确实有机会战胜她……你确实很懂得如何扭转局势，大人。”
languages.original_text: "You're personally willing to stand against her? That changes things significantly. With you, the resistance has a chance... You certainly know how to turn a situation around, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: “你真的打算亲自站出来反对她吗？这个理由确实相当有力。如果有你在，反抗军就有机会战胜她了……你确实很懂得如何扭转局势，大人。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「彼女と直接対決するおつもりなんです？これで状況は大きく変わりますね。でも、陛下がいればレジスタンスにもチャンスができる…陛下は、状況を変えることがお上手ですね」
languages.original_text: "You're personally willing to stand against her? That changes things significantly. With you, the resistance has a chance... You certainly know how to turn a situation around, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女と直接対決するおつもりなんです？これで状況は大きく変わりますね。でも、陛下がいればレジスタンスにもチャンスができる…陛下は、状況を変えることがお上手ですね」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «¿Está dispuest{mf|o|a} a enfrentarse a ella en persona? Eso lo cambia todo. Con usted la resistencia tiene una oportunidad... Usted sí que sabe darle la vuelta a una situación, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: "You're personally willing to stand against her? That changes things significantly. With you, the resistance has a chance... You certainly know how to turn a situation around, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: «¿Está dispuest{mf|o|a} a enfrentarse a ella en persona? Sería una discusión acalorada. Con usted la resistencia tiene una oportunidad... Usted sí que sabe darle la vuelta a una situación, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Ihr seid bereit, Euch persönlich gegen sie zu stellen? Das ändert die Lage drastisch. Mit Euch hat der Widerstand eine Chance ... Ihr wisst, wie man eine Lage auf den Kopf stellt, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft."
languages.original_text: "You're personally willing to stand against her? That changes things significantly. With you, the resistance has a chance... You certainly know how to turn a situation around, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: "Seid Ihr bereit, Euch persönlich gegen sie zu stellen? Das wäre ein mächtiges Argument. Mit Euch hat der Widerstand eine Chance ... Ihr wisst, wie man eine Lage auf den Kopf stellt, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Vous comptez vraiment vous dresser contre elle ? voilà qui change tout... Avec vous à ses côtés, la résistance a une chance... On peut dire que vous savez retourner une situation, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "You're personally willing to stand against her? That changes things significantly. With you, the resistance has a chance... You certainly know how to turn a situation around, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: « Vous comptez vraiment vous dresser contre elle ? Voilà qui changerait tout. Avec vous à ses côtés, la résistance a une chance... On peut dire que vous savez retourner une situation, Votre Seigneurie. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Onun karşısına bizzat çıkmaya niyetli misiniz yani? O hâlde durum değişir. Sizin desteğinizle direnişin bir şansı olacaktır... {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, işlerin gidişatına nasıl yön vereceğinizi sahiden iyi biliyorsunuz."
languages.original_text: "You're personally willing to stand against her? That changes things significantly. With you, the resistance has a chance... You certainly know how to turn a situation around, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
